description: A hubot script inspired by the character Lucky from the television show King of the Hill
readme:
[![pipeline status](https://gitlab.com/jmknutson/hubot-lucky/badges/master/pipeline.svg)](https://gitlab.com/jmknutson/hubot-lucky/commits/master)

# hubot-lucky-koth

A hubot script inspired by the character Lucky from the television show King of the Hill

See [`src/lucky.js`](src/lucky.js) for full documentation.

## Installation

In hubot project repo, run:

`npm install hubot-lucky-koth --save`

Then add **hubot-lucky-koth** to your `external-scripts.json`:

```json
[
  "hubot-lucky-koth"
]
```

## Sample Interaction

```
user1>> say something
hubot>> Lucky is on the case. That's usually what I say when I drink beer, but this time it refers to this mystery.
```

## NPM Module

https://www.npmjs.com/package/hubot-lucky-koth
